title: Anyone find pot heads annoying?
body:
I don't care if people smoke weed, I do it occasionally at parties and such but I find pot heads to be like the hardest people to be around. 
By pot heads I mean the people who feel the need to spark up just to enjoy simple things like going out to the movies, or the people who think marijuana is the cure to everything including gunshot wounds. 




... or the people who intentionally feed and the say its cause they are high.
